title: Unequal pain relief at home for dying patients

title_detail.value: Unequal pain relief at home for dying patients

summary: Pain relief and end of life care is not being provided equally to people with advanced progressive diseases who were at home during their last three months of life, according to a study of 43,000 people who died across England.

summary_detail.value: Pain relief and end of life care is not being provided equally to people with advanced progressive diseases who were at home during their last three months of life, according to a study of 43,000 people who died across England.
